title: Canoeing at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Men's slalom K-1
text:
These are the results of the men's K-1 <a href="Slalom%20canoeing">slalom</a> competition in <a href="canoeing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics">canoeing at the 1996 Summer Olympics</a>. The K-1 (kayak single) event is raced by one-man <a href="kayak">kayak</a>s through a <a href="Whitewater%20racing">whitewater</a> course. The venue for the 1996 Olympic competition was along the <a href="Toccoa/Ocoee%20River">Toccoa/Ocoee River</a> near the <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia</a>-<a href="Tennessee">Tennessee</a> state line.
Results.
The 44 competitors each took two runs through the whitewater slalom course on July 28. The best result of the runs counted for the event.
